SELECT A.MSG_CD AS CODE , A.MSG_CD || '(' || MIN(DECODE(A.LANG_CD, 'KR', A.MSG_NM, '')) || '/' || MIN(DECODE(A.LANG_CD, 'EN', A.MSG_NM, '')) || ')'AS LABEL FROM (SELECT MM.LANG_CD , MM.MSG_TYPE , MM.MSG_CD , MM.MSG_NM FROM MOM_COM_DIV_V MCD , MOM_MESSAGE MM WHERE MCD.COMPANY_CD = MM.COMPANY_CD AND MCD.DIVISION_CD = MM.DIVISION_CD AND MM.COMPANY_CD = #{companyCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MM.DIVISION_CD = #{divisionCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MM.MSG_TYPE = 'WIDGET' AND MM.MSG_CD IN ( SELECT MMS.MSG_CD FROM MOM_MESSAGE MMS WHERE MMS.COMPANY_CD = MM.COMPANY_CD AND MMS.DIVISION_CD = MMS.DIVISION_CD AND TRIM(UPPER(MMS.MSG_NM)) LIKE '%' || TRIM(UPPER(#{searchKey, jdbcType=VARCHAR})) || '%' )
) A GROUP BY A.MSG_TYPE , A.MSG_CD ORDER BY LABEL

SELECT DROPDWON_ID AS CODE , DROPDWON_NM || '(' || DROPDWON_ID || ')' AS LABEL FROM MOM_DROP_DOWN WHERE DIVISION_CD = #{divisionCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND COMPANY_CD = #{companyCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY CODE

SELECT MM.MENU_ID AS CODE , MM.MENU_ID ||'('|| MM.MENU_NM ||')' AS NAME FROM MOM_DIVISION_MENU MDM , MOM_MENU MM WHERE MDM.MENU_ID = MM.MENU_ID AND MDM.COMPANY_CD = #{companyCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MDM.DIVISION_CD = #{divisionCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MDM.MENU_ID <> 'root' AND MM.MENU_TYPE = 'P' ORDER BY MM.SORT_NO
SELECT DISTINCT PROGRAM_ID AS CODE , PROGRAM_ID AS NAME FROM MOM_MENU

SELECT MP.PROGRAM_ID , MP.TEMPLATE_ID , MW.MENU_ID , MW.GRID_PROPERTY , MW.COLUMN_PROPERTY , MW.SEARCH_PROPERTY , MW.POPUP_PROPERTY , MW.BUTTON_PROPERTY , MM.PARAM FROM MOM_WIDGET MW , MOM_MENU MM , MOM_PROGRAM MP WHERE MW.MENU_ID = MM.MENU_ID AND MM.PROGRAM_ID = MP.PROGRAM_ID AND MW.COMPANY_CD = #{companyCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MW.DIVISION_CD = #{divisionCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MW.MENU_ID = #{menuId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MW.GRID_ID = #{gridId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MW.LOCALE_CD = #{langCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT MGPD.PROPERTY_NAME , MGPD.DEFAULT_VALUE AS PROPERTY_VALUE , MGPD.DEFAULT_VALUE , MGPD.VALID_VALUE , MGPD.DATA_TYPE , MGPD.DESCRIPTION FROM MOM_GRID_PROPERTY_DOC MGPD

SELECT MGPD.CATEGORY , MGPD.PROPERTY_NAME , MGP.PROPERTY_VALUE , MGPD.DEFAULT_VALUE , MGPD.VALID_VALUE , MGPD.DATA_TYPE , MGPD.DESCRIPTION FROM MOM_GRID_PROPERTY MGP , MOM_GRID_PROPERTY_DOC MGPD WHERE MGP.PROPERTY_NAME(+) = MGPD.PROPERTY_NAME AND MGP.COMPANY_CD(+) = #{companyCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MGP.DIVISION_CD(+) = #{divisionCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MGP.MENU_ID(+) = #{menuId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MGP.GRID_ID(+) = #{gridId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY CATEGORY,PROPERTY_VALUE
